summary: This is an email from the FBI Victim Services Division inviting victims of Jeffrey Epstein to attend informational meetings in New York or Florida to learn about available victim services. The document is an outreach communication to potential victims regarding case NY-3027571.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the perpetrator whose victims are being contacted by the FBI Victim Services Division for support services.

events.title: Florida Victim Services Meeting
events.description: FBI Victim Services Division holds a meeting for victims of Jeffrey Epstein in Miramar, FL to provide information about available services.

events.title: New York Victim Services Meeting
events.description: FBI Victim Services Division holds a meeting for victims of Jeffrey Epstein in New York, NY to provide information about available services.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division is actively reaching out to victims of Jeffrey Epstein regarding case number NY-3027571.
Two informational meetings were scheduled for victims: October 15, 2019 in Miramar, Florida and October 23, 2019 in New York City.
Victims were allowed to bring one support person to the meetings.
The FBI explicitly states they cannot provide specific details about the active investigation during these meetings.
The communication demonstrates ongoing victim support efforts by federal authorities in the Epstein case.
